name: The Secret History of the United States of America!
name_original: The Secret History of the United States of America!
description:
The Secret History of the United States of America!

A journey of discovery.

Art by Brian Lee

Story and Dialogue by TalkToTransformer.com (with assistance from Brian Lee)

wasd or arrow keys to move (or swipe on mobile)

press down (or swipe down on mobile) to continue during "cutscenes"

(I had an idea for a bitsy game and then I made it in one day.)
